name: pagopa-notice-pdf
description: Template for generating pagoPA PDF notices

scripts.generate-many-instalments-p1: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-many-instalments-p1.hbs --dataFile notice-many-instalments.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-many-instalments-p2: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-many-instalments-p2.hbs --dataFile notice-many-instalments.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-cds-infraction: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-cds-infraction.hbs --dataFile notice-infraction.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-cds-infraction-p1: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-cds-infraction-p1.hbs --dataFile notice-infraction.json && node generatePDF
scripts.generate-cds-infraction-p2: node compileHandlebars --templateFile template-cds-infraction-p2.hbs --dataFile notice-infraction.json && node generatePDF
